Global.CompanyDescription: We provide programming expertise, custom software solutions and consulting for engineers of all trades. We help you do the best job you can.
Global.SEOKeywords: cfd, computational fluid dynamics, programming, engineering, unit converter, flucomp

Page.Name: Home
Page.Content:
Our Mission

As our customer’s advocate we provide cost-effective, long lasting design and solutions in market and technology intelligence spanning the Oil & Natural Gas Value Chain and Bio-renewable markets for companies, private investors and research assisting decision makers define strategies.

Our Focus

We strive to work as partners with our clients, to best address multi-client research needs with objective data and analyses. Our primary focus has been in the complex Oil & Natural Gas Value Chain with near-term and long-term profitability dependent on multiple markets – upstream production, refined products to petrochemical feedstock, power and gas liquids. Our expertise has been a foundational-level integration of the technology, research, rapid commercialization of new technology, engineering and understanding of the Natural Gas and NGL market to provide our clients with a base to build upon. We go beyond this in recognizing that “learning to fish is far better than merely giving you the fish” by assisting our clients through on-site training to understand how to build these models and which metrics to rely on for investment; becoming critical of results and knowing the right questions to ask is the foundation of success.

Product.Name: AbiConvert
Product.Description:
Convert the units you need as an engineer, in an easy-to-use interface.

New units are added often, send us an email if you think we're missing something!

Product.Name: PipeEngicalc ALPHA
Product.Description:
PipeEngicalc is a comprehensive mechanical pipeline analysis software, which assists with design, analysis, calculations and troubleshooting of piping systems; saving time and minimizing operating costs. This is an alpha version for polypropylene pipelines with Steel grades coming soon.

You are invited to download the fully functional test version of PipeEngicalc now! We truly welcome and appreciate feedback on specific features, and what you would like to see added to this program. We especially appreciate feedback on bugs and errors encountered while using this application.

Page.Name: Services
Page.Content:
Our Services

Engineering and Technical Operational Consulting Services

These are related to plant technical operations, optimization and engineering aspects of the business: assets/hardware rather than the commercial aspects of the business. Example services that may be performed are plant optimization studies, environmental compliance reviews, troubleshooting or “plant triage”, assistance with equipment sizing, advising vendors on marketing plans or product.

Assistance with Vendors

As projects move through the Front End Engineering Design Process (FEED) or Front End Loaded (FEL) RFQ/RFP are required. We can assist not only in in putting together the RFPs but also in vendor vetting. This is an important process, because some vendors will try to fit the bid specs or requirements around and into their products.

Economic Feasibility Studies and Financial Estimates of Capital and Operating Costs

During technical consulting services, it is often required to create pro forma estimates of plant construction costs, or other financial estimates, that are typically used in final investment decisions to proceed or not to proceed.

Engineering Software Applications and IT Consulting Services

Flucomp's Founder, Dr. Diana Matonis, has created engineering and design software tools, which are used around the world on projects arnging from GHG plant emissions calculators, small retrofits of existing facilities to large, green-field facilities, whether on land or sea by major multi-national Oil & Gas corporations.

We continue our founder's original focus in developing customer-specific and customized computer software and tools that deliver high individual and corporate-wide technical know-how and productivity regardless of the systems used.

Engineering Consultancy

Flucomp was founded by Dr. Diana Matonis, a leader in her industry for more than 25 years. Our engineering consultancy practice includes our capabilities in plant assessments through the use of process engineering and design, to provide insights of current efficiency and product yield leading to their improvements through new plant technology and startups.

Example

We improved the quality, consistency and yield of a product for a startup biofuels company that used a new integrated pyrolytic process for obtaining saturated and unsaturated alkyl esters from biomass; we improved their process to the point where they were able to produce a consistent biodiesel-grade product.

Our Process

In cultivating a robust assessment, evaluation and technology planning, we utilize our skills and experience and have identified and typically use three key phases as a starting point.

  1. Iterative Analysis
    • SIPOC (Suppliers, Inputs, Processes, Outputs and Customer) oriented interviews
    • Models made based on the results of these interviews
    • Modeled processes are reviewed with the process owners and/or stakeholders
  2. Model Based Systems Engineering for Value (Value Based)
    • Translate business practice reality into critical design models and requirement specifications.
    • Accurately capture, analyze and verify design integrity before problems become embedded in the system
  3. Implementation
    • Improvements grounded in reality, making them efficient and effective.
    • Requirements create an accurate picture of business practice needs.
    • Understanding the client's business practices results in a more focused capability development and improvement
    • Results are directly traceable to the implemented solutions

Software Development Services

Our team has more than 30 combined years of experience in software development. We currently provide the following:

Software Mobile Apps Web Development
  • C/C++ Applications
  • C#/.NET Applications
  • Windows 8 Applications
  • Java Applications
  • Database Services: MySQL, Microsoft SQL, SQLite
  • Android Applications in Java
  • HTML5 Platform-Independent Mobile Applications
  • Cloud Computing Solutions
  • HTML5/JavaScript/jQuery Client-Side Webapps
  • PHP/MySQL Sites

We have found that by working side-by-side with our clients will produce the best results.
Email us now for a quote: vmatonis@flucomp.com.

Person.Name: Dr. Diana Matonis
Person.Title: Founder
Person.Biography:
Reputation 20-year track record of growing revenues, improving operations and managing/developing strategies to capture value in arrived solutions. I also formed and led Global Chemical Manufacturers and Oil & Gas Joint Industry Partnerships. My work in Natural Gas Pipeline modeling has been globally recognized; I have been an internationally-invited presenter in peer-reviewed conferences and global Chemical Manufacturer and Oil & Gas private corporate invitations, saving each company a 15-20% chemical cost per month savings.

Specialties Energy Project Development / Management, Operations / Asset Management, economic analysis, competitive analysis, statistical analysis, project management, financial analysis, business strategy, strategic planning, new technology development, managing budgets determining headcount requirements, working with contractors, writing technical specifications, developing software tools, working with suppliers and reviewing supplier designs, diagnosing customer equipment, working with production on problem solving and trouble shooting, and developing detailed test programs.

Person.Name: Vince Matonis
Person.Title: IT Director
Person.Biography:
Software Developer for 6 years.
Programming experience: C#, C/C++, Java
Web Development experience: ASP.NET/C#, PHP/MySQL, HTML4&HTML5, CSS2&CSS3, JavaScript, jQuery

Page.Name: Portfolio
Page.Content:
Examples of our Work

Engineering

Independent consulting includes projects in the fields of biomass pyrolysis plant optimization and economics, chemical analyses and process development with an initial pro-forma analysis, new development processes and technology training and research assistance in the area of thermal plasma pyrolysis process for converting waste to fuels, and the integration of fuel cells within existing Power Plants at Fuel Cell Energy.

For example, we improved the quality, and consistency and yield of product for a startup biofuels company using a new integrated pyrolytic process for obtaining saturated and unsaturated alkyl esters from biomass. to consistently produce biodiesel grade product.

Software Our custom software includes the successful completion of a major stand-alone software package called Pipecalc: a calculator for the properties of polypropylene pipeline installations, both subterranean and above-ground.
